full_title: pop ur shit by 21 Savage, Young Thug & Metro Boomin
title: pop ur shit

description.plain:
“pop ur shit” by 21 Savage is a high-energy, trap-infused track that showcases the artist’s gritty lyricism and signature delivery. With pulsating beats and bold production, the song creates an intense atmosphere that complements 21 Savage’s confident and unapologetic style.
Notably, the song page doesn’t finish Young Thug’s lines because he is currently on trial and they are using his lyrics as evidence. FREE THUG!!!

body.plain:
“pop ur shit” by 21 Savage is a high-energy, trap-infused track that showcases the artist’s gritty lyricism and signature delivery. With pulsating beats and bold production, the song creates an intense atmosphere that complements 21 Savage’s confident and unapologetic style.
Notably, the song page doesn’t finish Young Thug’s lines because he is currently on trial and they are using his lyrics as evidence. FREE THUG!!!
